name: Underground Cart Adventures: Cart School Ultimate Tunnels Edition Simulator: The Final Game
name_original: Underground Cart Adventures: Cart School Ultimate Tunnels Edition Simulator: The Final Game
description:
In this game you are late for class, so you must drive a cart to arrive on time! Avoid obstacles to maintain your speed and get the best time!

Final project submission for game design

A game by Vivek, Doeball, Duncan, and Rightdress
